data.system_settings: Arch Linux (kernel 4.12.4-1-ARCH), Cinnamon DE (3.4.4-1), Muffin WM (3.4.0-1)
data.actual_result: It breaks the italics of surrounding words and shows the underscores around it, unlike other emoji
data.expected_result: It should (as with `_:test:_` or the non-custom `_:flag_gb:_`) not break italics – this is noticeable if you put words beside it or use it in a "/me" action
data.short_description: Wrapping a custom server emoji with an underscore in the name in italics breaks the italics
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a custom server emoji with an underscore in the name (e.g. `:test_this:`) - Wrap it in underscores and send a message with it (`_:test_this:_`)
